item.description:
Steps:

1. Create one drawed Templates with:
    

Name: should_have_same_template_to_LIVE_and_working_1

Body: Add the SYSTEM_CONTAINER with a with of 12

Publish it.

2\. Create a Page with DEFAULT lang and using the "should_have_same_template_to_LIVE_and_working_1" template

3\. Render the Page in LIVE and PREVIEW MODE and check that the layout have the SYSTEM_CONTAINER with a width of 12.

4\. Change the page's Template to "should_have_same_template_to_LIVE_and_working_2" and just save.

6\. Render both Page version and check that now the results is "Template 2" for both.
